original_conversation.content: Okay so I'm—I'm calling 'bout my receipt. For work. Park service needs it by, um, by Friday.

Right right. Expedited.

Perfect and, uh, just so you know reference number REF-6672-RANGER is—is attached to everything so if anyone gives you trouble just, um, just quote that and they'll see I've basically flagged this as, uh, as pre-approved for reimbursement which technically I'm not supposed to do but...
